title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: The changes made by removing the working set should not be applied immediately.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
